name: Standard Business Plan
description: Electricity contract for small and medium businesses with fixed pricing.
features: Fixed rate throughout the contract duration

name: Premium Business Plan
description: High-end electricity contract for large businesses with customized pricing.
features: Priority intervention in case of issues

name: Basic Residential Plan
description: Simple and economical electricity contract for individuals.
features: Customer service by phone and email

name: Comfort Residential Plan
description: Electricity contract with additional services for households.
